meaning_str.bing:
adj. 迷人的；楚楚动人的；吸引人的；引起兴趣的
网络. 有吸引力的；有魅力的；诱人的

迷人的；楚楚动人的；吸引人的；引起兴趣的
有吸引力的；有魅力的；诱人的

吸引人的；有吸引力的；迷人的；有魅力的；引人注目的；诱人的；引起兴趣的；有诱惑力的；性感的；英俊的；妩媚的；令人愉快的；令人愉悦的

1.en: In many cases blog design tends to be less attractive and less innovative than website design in general.
1.cn: 许多情况下博客设计变得比一般网站设计更没有吸引力和创新性。

2.en: But resumes from women that included photos were up to 30 percent less likely to get a response, whether or not the women were attractive.
2.cn: 但是贴着女人照片的简历得到回应的比例会降低30%，不管这个女人漂不漂亮。

3.en: Some people find it so attractive that they do not know when to stop.
3.cn: 有人觉得这样很有吸引力，但是不知道什么时候结束。

1.en: That's one of the things that makes her so attractive.
1.cn: 正因为这些经历，她才如此受欢迎。

2.en: Possible headline: Attractive Couple Makes World Better.
2.cn: 也许标题应该写: 迷人的夫妇让世界变的更好。

3.en: You must be joking. No, I really heard they find you attractive.
3.cn: 开什么玩笑？不，听说他们觉得你很正。

4.en: So, what did this woman look like? She was like 30, dark hair, attractive.
4.cn: 那个女人长什么样子？她大概30岁，深色头发，很漂亮。

5.en: Sheldon. Are you aware that your sister is an incredibly attractive woman?
5.cn: 谢尔顿，你难道没意识到你妹妹魅不可挡吗？

6.en: Excuse my dad. He's not used to talking to attractive women. Oh, thank you.
6.cn: 请原谅我爸，他不习惯和漂亮女人说话。噢，谢谢。

7.en: How come you never eat broccoli? I'm married, I don't have to be attractive.
7.cn: 你怎么从来不吃西兰花？我都结婚了，不需要注意形象。

8.en: He can't talk to attractive woman, or in your case, a cheesecake-scented goddess.
8.cn: 他不能跟漂亮女人说话，或者就是象你这样有迷人芝士蛋糕味的女神。

9.en: You're an attractive, intelligent woman and let's face it, Mike's kind of a wimp.
9.cn: 你是一个迷人的，聪明的女人，让我们面对这些，麦克简直有点混蛋。

10.en: Oh no. Oh yes, Me like what me see. Well, what me can see, it's only an attractive blur.
10.cn: 哦不。是的，我喜欢我自己所看到的，而我所看到的，是你的魅力。

11.en: Well, look Ross, I think Carol's great and I'm sure you're a very attractive man, but I….
11.cn: 罗斯，我觉得卡萝很漂亮，我也相信你很有魅力，但是…

12.en: We're being ridiculous. There's no way a woman that attractive is trying to seduce Sheldon Cooper.
12.cn: 我们太杞人忧天了。那么漂亮的女人是不可能试图勾引谢尔顿·库珀的。

13.en: Okay, so we now have a socially-awkward genius in a room full of attractive, age-appropriate women.
13.cn: 好了，我们现在让这个不擅交际的小天才深陷于一屋子年龄相当且令人销魂的女孩群中了。

14.en: Hugh? Hugh's terribly attractive, I'll give you that, but I don't really think he's the marrying kind.
14.cn: 休？我可以跟你这么说，休简直迷倒众生，但我不觉得他是会结婚的那种男人。

15.en: Well, supposably, these bald-bodies find you attractive. So, maybe you can work out some sort of trade.
15.cn: 这些猪头应该会煞到你，或许你能想想办法。

16.en: Well, that's gonna be tough, Mon. I mean it's hard for me to be around an attractive woman and not flirt.
16.cn: 太难了，毕竟美女当前，我很难不打情骂俏。

17.en: Well, he is much more attractive than Leonard. Yes,but that's gonna be true of a lot of guys she works for.
17.cn: 他的确是比莱纳德好看多了。没错，但她的历任老板中这样的人也不少。

18.en: Yeah, she seemed cool, attractive. I'll do it. Oh thank you, Chandler, this is so great, she's gonna love me.
18.cn: 她还不错，蛮吸引人的，好吧。谢谢你，太好了，她会爱死我。

19.en: Well, if we assume your looks are average, right off the bat, 50% of men on Earth are more attractive than you.
19.cn: 假设你的外貌是算中等，随便一算地球上有一半的男人比你还有魅力。
